news.title: An Evolutionary Psychology Explanation For Mass Shootings
news.summary: Men commit over 85% of all homicides, 91% of all same-sex homicides and 97% of all same-sex homicides in which the victim and killer aren’t related to each other.

news.title: The psychology of mass shootings
news.summary: Men are the perpetrators in a staggeringly high number of homicides, especially mass shootings - up to as many as 97 per cent.
